tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (S (NP (NP (NNP Angry) (NNS people) (POS 's)) (NNS perceptions)) (VP (VBP are) (ADJP (JJ real) (PP (TO to) (NP (NNP THEM)))))) (: -) (S (NP (PRP$ your) (NN opinion)) (VP (VBZ is) (ADJP (JJ irrelevant)))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [real/JJ nsubj>[perceptions/NNS nmod:poss>[people/NNS compound>Angry/NNP case>'s/POS]] cop>are/VBP nmod:to>[THEM/NNP case>to/TO] punct>-/: parataxis>[irrelevant/JJ nsubj>[opinion/NN nmod:poss>your/PRP$] cop>is/VBZ] punct>./.]
